name: EUNO
public_notice: Euno Coin had a token swap 1:160 to its own chain. See https://medium.com/@eunocoin/let-the-countdown-begin-as-we-get-set-to-euno-blast-off-to-euno-2-0-f0bb6725bb3 . Therefore the reduction in price that occurred on the 15th October is reflecting the ratio of the swap. To compare the real project trend,please use the "Market Cap Chart" instead of the "Price Chart"

description.en: EUNO is a decentralized cryptocurrency that was established in June 2018 with the aim of becoming a leading payment medium in tomorrow's cashless society. In its bid to create a sustainable and trustworthy product, EUNO stresses the importance of fair distribution, long-term stability, and ease of use. Its flagship product EUNO Pay will permit instant crypto-to-fiat mobile payments using near field communication (NFC) technology and offer a return on utilized coins through its in-development ACID protocol. EUNO is a self-funded project that endorses a participatory approach in development and strategic direction through its decentralized governance system. It is supported by an international team from diverse professional backgrounds such as software engineering, product development, finance, and marketing.

status_updates.description:
Euno and Baanx are proud to officially announce our partnership!

What does this mean for Euno?

It means we will have our own Debit Cards for our European users to spend their digital assets on a global scale and have access to our NFC EunoPay wallet!

https://twitter.com/Baanx_BXX/status/1419674610535120897
status_updates.user: Lee - Director of Community and Business Outreach
Lee - Director of Community and Business Outreach

status_updates.description:
We hope you all had an amazing summer!

Quick update - All the team are back from their holidays and we are now working hard with @BaanxGroup
to get Euno Pay rolled out in time for everyone to get their families Christmas gifts via Euno Pay!

Exciting times ahead!
status_updates.user: Lee - Director of Community and Business Outreach

status_updates.description:
Don't forget to join Euno Telegram voice chat with Director of operations Faustino Hernandez today 6pm UTC.

The countdown is pinned in our official room  https://t.me/EUNOofficial

We look forward to seeing you there!
status_updates.user: Lee - Director of Community and Business Outreach

status_updates.description:
We are excited to announce that we are now listed on
Hitbtc and trading is live!

Big thank you to the community for your awesome support!

If you have any further questions you can find us on Telegram t.me/EUNOofficial

twitter.com/EunoCoin/status/1381985985039319054
status_updates.user: Lee - Director of Community and Business Outreach

status_updates.description:
Check out how our AMA went with our Director of Operations Faustino Hernandez!

https://youtube.com/watch?v=2BYC1Bc78rk

Big thank you again to @CryptoTalkzInfo for making this possible!

If you have any further questions you can find us on Telegram https://t.me/EUNOofficial
status_updates.user: Lee - Director of Community and Business Outreach

status_updates.description:
We are Excited to announce Crypto Talkz will be hosting an AMA with our Director of Operations Patrick on the 5th of April at 1PM UTC

Join for a chance to win some USDT!

https://t.me/Crypto_Talkzs
status_updates.user: Lee - Director of Community and Business Outreach
